children.description: A Sublime Text plugin to the awesome auto-complete library Jedi.

children.name: Anaconda
children.description: Anaconda turns your Sublime Text 3 in a full featured Python development IDE.

children.name: YouCompleteMe
children.description: Includes [Jedi](https://github.com/davidhalter/jedi)-based completion engine for Python.

children.name: Jedi-vim
children.description: Vim bindings for the Jedi auto-completion library for Python.

children.name: Python-mode
children.description: An all in one plugin for turning Vim into a Python IDE.

children.name: PTVS
children.description: Python Tools for Visual Studio.

children.name: PyCharm
children.description: Commercial Python IDE by JetBrains. Has free community edition available.

children.name: LiClipse
children.description: Free polyglot IDE based on Eclipse. Uses PyDev for Python support.

children.name: Spyder
children.description: Open Source Python IDE.

children.name: Travis CI
children.description: A popular CI service for your open source and [private](https://travis-ci.com) projects. (GitHub only)

children.name: CircleCI
children.description: A CI service that can run very fast parallel testing. (GitHub only)

children.name: Vexor CI
children.description: A continuous integration tool for private apps with pay-per-minute billing model.

children.name: Wercker
children.description: A Docker-based platform for building and deploying applications and microservices.

children.name: Landscape
children.description: An early warning system for your Python codebase.

children.name: QuantifiedCode
children.description: A data-driven, automated, continuous code review tool.

children.name: Trending Python repositories on GitHub today
